item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hello, I’m Xinlin.

I am an AI and/or Software Engineer. I was a software engineer with many years’ experience before I came to NZ. Now I’m a Master’s Degree student studying AI technologies in AUT, and working as a summer intern in Data Scientist team in TOMRA Food.

This is a little place where I organize my knowledge and skills, refresh my mind, and express my technical ideas as well. Thanks for stopping by! Feel free to contact me on LinkedIn or GitHub.
